title: Eco Brief with Carl Riccadonna (Audio)
itunes:title: Eco Brief with Carl Riccadonna (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Carl Riccadonna\u0010Chief US Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Will discuss the July Jobs Report. He is joined by Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who has his "Chart of the Day."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
